CustomField.description: Displays the SOP Basket Type code, which corresponds to the current picklist value of Status.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Status__c , "Quote", "1", "Order in Progress", "2", "Order Invoiced", "4", "Quote Closed", "10", "Order Canceled", "20", "Refund", "30", "NA")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the SOP Basket Type code, which corresponds to the current picklist value of Status.
CustomField.label: SOP BasketType
